arts.ttl: Report: Arsenal identify Martin Zubimendi alternative, Atletico Madrid ace wanted by Mikel Arteta
arts.sum: Arsenal are reportedly eyeing Atletico Madrid’s Pablo Barrios as a potential alternative if they fail to secure a deal for Martin Zubimendi this summer. Zubimendi, who is expected to join Mikel Arteta’s side in the 2025 summer transfer window, has already agreed to a four-year contract with Arsenal, it has been reported. arts.ttl: Arsenal join race to sign Martin Zubimendi alternative
arts.sum: Arsenal are reportedly interested in signing Atletico Madrid midfielder Pablo Barrios if they are unable to finalise an agreement for Martin Zubimendi this summer. Atletico Madrid star Pablo Barrios is one such option, as per TBR Football, with Arsenal prepared to battle for his signature later this year.
